verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana kama wewe
ungehesabu maovu yetu,
(Nani angesimama,
nani angesimama
nani angesimama
mbele yako.) x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lakini kwako
kuna msamaha,
ili wewe uogopwe,
nimekungoja Bwana,
roho yangu,
na neno lake nimelitumaini.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nafsi yangu inamngoja Bwana,
kuliko walinzi,
walinzi waingojavyo,
asubuhi,
naam walizi wangojavyo asubuhi.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana toka vilindini,
nimekulilia,
sauti yangu, usikie,
masikio yako yasikie
dua zangu.
